name: üëë BILAL-MD üëë
description: ‚ô•Ô∏è PAKISTAN'S FIRST BOT IN URDU LANGUAGE ‚ô•Ô∏è

SESSION_ID.description: AP NE PAIR YA QR CODE SE WHATSAPP LINK KIA HOGA TO APKE PAS WHATSAPP PER EK CODE AYA HOGA AP WO CODE WHATSAPP SE COPY KAR KE YAHA NICHE BOX ME PASTE KARE

BILAL_MD_CODE.description: IS NICHE WALI LINE ME EK CODE DYA GAYA HAI IS KO DELETE MAT KARNA WARNA BOT ME ERROR AYE GA BOT DEPLOY NAHI HOGA

STICKER_NAME.description: APKA BOT JO STICKERS BANAYE GA UN STICKERS PER KIA NAME HO STICKERS PER NICHE BOX ME NAME LIKHE

PREFIX.description: AP APNE BOT KO KON SI NISHANI SE CHALANA CHAHTE HAI JESE . ! ? : & AP IN ME SE KOI BHI NISHAN NICHE BOX ME LIKHE PHIR APKA BOT JAB ACTIVE HO JAYE GA TO IS NISHAN KE ZARIYE CHALE GA

MODE.description: AP KIA CHAHTE HAI KE AP KA BOT SIRF AP KHUD USE KARE TO ISKE LIE AP NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆprivate‚ùØ LIKHO AUR AGAR HAR KOI USE KARE TO USKE LIE NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆpublic‚ùØ LIKHO

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: AGAR AP ALL TIME 24 HOURS ONLINE SHOW HONA CHAHTE HAI TO NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆtrue‚ùØ LIKHO AGAR NAHI CHAHTE TO USKE LIE NICHE ‚ùÆfalse‚ùØ LIKHE

AUTO_VOICE.description: BOT ME KUCH VOICES ADD HAI JAB KOI MSG KRTA HAI TO VOICE JATE HAI AGAR AP YE SETTING ON RAKHNA CHAHTE TO NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆtrue‚ùØ LIKHE AGAR SETTING OFF RAKHNI HAI TO NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆfalse‚ùØ LIKHO

AUTO_REPLY.description: AGAR KOI HUME MESSAGE KARTA HAI TO HAMARA REPLY KHUD HI HO JATA HAI YEH SETTING ON RAKHNE K LIE NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆtrue‚ùØ LIKHE AGAR OFF RAKHNI HAI TO NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆfalse‚ùØ LIKHO

AUTO_STICKER.description: BOT ME KUCH STICKERS ADD HAI JAB KOI HUME MESSAGE KARTA HAI TO WO STICKER KHUD HI SEND HO JATE HAI AGAR AP NE YE SETTING ON RAKHNI TO NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆtrue‚ùØ LIKHO AGAR YE SETTING OFF RAKHNI TO NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆfalse‚ùØ LIKHO

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: JAB KOI STATUS LAGAYE GA TO WO USY TIME SEEN HO JAYE GA APKO SEEN KARNE KI ZARURAT HI NAHIII AGAR AP NE YE SETTING ON RAKHNI HAI TO NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆtrue‚ùØ LIKHO AGAR YE SETTING OFF RAKHNI HAI TO NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆfalse‚ùØ LIKHO

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: AP KIA CHAHTE HAI JAB APKA BOT STATUS SEEN KARE TO SATH ME REACT BHI KAREE TO USKE LIE NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆtrue‚ùØ LIKHO AGAR AP CHAHTE KE APKA BOT SIRF STATUS SEEN KARE REACT NAA KARE TO USKE LIE NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆfalse‚ùØ LIKHO

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: AP KIA CHAHTE HAI KE JAB APKA BOT STATUS SEEN KARE TO SATH KOI B ACHA SA REPLY BHI KARE TO USKE LIE NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆtrue‚ùØ LIKHO AUR AGAR AP CHAHTE KE SIRF STATUS SEEN KARE KOI REPLY NAA KARE TO USKE LIEE AP NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆfalse‚ùØ LIKHO

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: APKA BOT JAB STATUS SEEN KARE GA TO YE MESSAGE BHEJE GAA STATUS KE REPLY MEE AP ISE APNE MESSAGE SE CHANGE KAR LO JO B APKA DIL KARE WO MESSAGE LIKH LO NICHE BOX ME
AUTO_STATUS_MSG.value: MENE SAB SE PEHLE APKA STATUS SEEN KIA HAIüåπ

OWNER_NAME.description: BOT KON USE KARE GA AP USKA NAME NICHE BOX ME LIKHO

OWNER_NUMBER.description: BOT USER KA WHATSAPP NUMBER NICHE LIKHO YAAD RAHE BOT KE SAB COMMANDS SIRF YEH NUMBER HI USE KAR PAYE GA BAKII KOI AUR SAB COMMANDS USE NAHI KAR PAYE GA OK

BOT_NAME.description: AP APNE BOT KA NAME NICHE BOX ME LIKHO

ANTI_LINK.description: GROUP ME KOI BHI LINK BHEJE GA TO APKA BOT LINK DELETE KARE GA AUR LINK BHEJNE WALO KO REMOVE KRE GA AGAR AP NE YE SETTING ON RAKHNI HAI TO USKE LIE AP NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆtrue‚ùØ LIKHO AGAR AP CHAHTE KE APKA BOT LINKS DELETE NAA KARE AUR MEMBER BHI REMOVE NAA KARE TO USKE LIE AP NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆfalse‚ùØ LIKHO

ANTI_LINK_KICK.description: AGAR AP CHAHTE HAI KE APKA BOT LINK BHEJNE WALE KO REMOVE BHI KARE TO USKE LIE AP NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆtrue‚ùØ LIKHO AGAR AP CHAHTE KE LINK DELETE KARE AUR MEMBER REMOVE NAAA KARE TO USKE LIE NICHE BOX ME ‚ùÆfalse‚ùØ LIKHO
